ingredients.ingredient: 1 (10.75 ounce) can condensed cheddar cheese soup

cookingTips: Slice potatoes uniformly for even cooking throughout the casserole
Layer potatoes and sauce mixture evenly to ensure consistent flavor distribution
Cover with foil during baking to prevent drying; uncover at the end for browning
enrichment.coachingPrompt: How can you prevent the potatoes from becoming mushy in this cheesy bake?
